Entries.DialogueText: Heh... It's not every day I get to speak to a human. Looks like you've got a little 'forest magic' in you... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh... It's not every day I get to speak to a human. Looks like you've got a little 'forest magic' in you...

Entries.DialogueText: Now... about my note... Did you bring the good stuff?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now... about my note... Did you bring the good stuff?

Entries.DialogueText: HOoOoOoooh... that smell... this is really sweet stuff! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: HOoOoOoooh... that smell... this is really sweet stuff!

Entries.DialogueText: ...it's my favorite sauce... it makes me very happy. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...it's my sauce... it makes me very happy.

Entries.DialogueText: I've got something special I want to show you...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've got something special I want to show you...

Entries.DialogueText: The bear left you with his special knowledge...
Entries.DisplayPattern: The bear left you with his special knowledge...

Entries.DialogueText: Salmonberries and Blackberries are now worth 3x the gold!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Salmonberries and Blackberries are now worth 3x the gold!
